Republic.definition: a government having a chief of state who is not a monarch and who in modern times is usually a president ;also

1.definition: a government having a chief of state who is not a monarch and who in modern times is usually a presidenta political unit (as a nation) having such a form of government

2.definition: a government in which supreme power resides in a body of citizens entitled to vote and is exercised by elected officers and representatives responsible to them and governing according to lawa political unit (as a nation) having such a form of government
